mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file ( table_code_pk, table_ref_pk, org_file_name , file_name, file_path, create_at, is_use) VALUES (#{tableCodePk}, #{tableRefPk}, #{orgFileName} , #{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{createAt}, #{isUse})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM file WHERE file_name = #{fileName} AND is_use = 1

SELECT f.id, f.table_code_pk, f.table_ref_pk, f.org_file_name, f.file_name, f.file_path, f.create_at, f.is_use FROM file f JOIN table_code tc ON f.table_code_pk = tc.id WHERE tc.table_name = #{tableName} AND f.table_ref_pk = #{tableRefPk} AND f.is_use = 1
